channel.title: [pi] help me please shops/npc help [pi]
channel.description:
Hello! I have 2 request today :My first request is I need a npc to sell things // N0T A SH0P // I need to say like "Welcome to the ticket shop" 'click to continue' "1b ticket or 100m ticket"
:My second request is I need a method to separate the PKP shop and the Donor shop I want to use the same item in both shops but I can only price one so I need help making a method to split apart the prices thanks, Fast feedback is always nice:) I would admire if we can talk over Skype : ooskiller1 cheers, Bluedevil666
